title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 76.30 - Applicability of drivers' school regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 76.30 - Applicability of drivers' school regulations

State Regulations

Except as provided in this section, this Part shall be
applicable with respect to a course given by a drivers' school to a new
driver. (a) The provisions of this

Part with respect to required records of a drivers' school shall not be
applicable with respect to any student who is taking only the pre-licensing
course. (b) For the purposes of
school location, a facility used to provide classroom training only shall not
be considered a place of business. (c) Any classroom used in conjunction with
the pre-licensing course must meet the requirements of Part 7 of this

Title. (d) An instructor of the
pre-licensing course must also meet the requirements of Part 7 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
76.30

Amended

New

York State Register September 7, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 36, eff. 9/7/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
